DOC.brief_title: Folic Acid Supplementation Women Child Bearing Age
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct two phase . An initial screening study perform determine folate status , MTHFR677 genotype body composition potential participant intervention study . Both folate status MTHFR677 genotype know independent predictor response folic acid supplementation . Blood sample collect , overnight fast , determination serum folate concentration MTHFR677 genotyping . Body composition 24-hr dietary recall also conduct screen visit . The second phase eight week supplementation trial 800 mcg/day folic acid . Screened individual determine serum folate < 30 nmol/L ( < 50th percentile NHANES 1999-2004 ) CC CT genotype ( MTHFR677 ) eligible inclusion supplementation trial . Participants instruct avoid dietary supplement , fortify ready-to-eat cereal , high folate content food intervention . Blood sample collect , overnight fast , baseline 4 8 week supplementation determination primary ( DNA methylation profile ) secondary ( nutritional , metabolic health status biomarkers ) outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: Screening Phase : Female 1840 yr Body Mass index 18.5 24.9 > 30 kg/m2 Intervention Study : Serum folate < 30 nmol/L MTHFR677CC MTHFR677CT genotype Currently pregnant , pregnancy within past 12 month Greater 2 previous pregnancy Use prescription drug oral contraceptive Chronic disease ( diabetes , hypertension , epilepsy , cancer , kidney disease , CVD ) Acute illness ( pneumonia , urinary tract infection , mononucleosis ) Use antibiotic past 30 day Current smoker Use dietary supplement include multivitamin past 30 day Habitual consumption fortify readytoeat cereal Significant weight change past 12 month Typical alcohol consumption 2 drink per day INTERVENTION : plus serum folate > 30 nmol/L ; MTHFR677TT genotype
